Instructions: **Alpha**: A, B, T, W, C, H\n**Email**: alexis.flores@arrow.com
**Alpha**: I, J, K, E, F, #, signs, D, Q, U, V, X, Y, Z\n**Email**: iliana.robles@arrow.com
Rationale: Handles Special Chars and Alpha Group I-Z.

Instructions: **Alpha**: L, P, M, N, O, R, G\n**Email**: valeria.sanchez@arrow.com
1. Search order/SO number in 'Digital Customer' Tab on SWB.\n2. Review: Vendor name, status, internal tracking, and OMT notes.
1. Search order confirmation number in Salesforce.\n2. Check for cases handled by Support or OMT to avoid duplicate task openings.
Search for the PO number in Salesforce for all supplier-specific orders.
1. Open Digital Customer section.\n2. Click on the order line result to view 'OMT Action Notes' in the lower panel.\n3. Note: Alert releases cannot be expedited.
Triggered when line price is below cost or margin threshold. OMT coordinates with Asset/Trade for release.
Triggered when order total exceeds vetting thresholds. Requires manual credit/risk review.
Specific holds for inventory allocation, export compliance, or customer credit limits.

1. ETQ > eRequests > Quality, GTMC & Warehouse.
2. New Document > Warehouse Requests > 'Sure Ship Domestic - Draft'.
3. Select Warehouse Code V72 and Host AC Prod.
4. Required: SO, Delivery ID (DID), and Line #s.
Rationale: Expedite Reno orders stuck for >2 days.

Instructions: 1. ETQ > Warehouse Requests > 'Sure Ship International - Draft'.\n2. Select Code CDR (Domestic) or CDM (International).\n3. Host: AC Prod.
Rationale: Expedite international cross-dock orders at Reno.

Instructions: 1. ETQ > Warehouse Requests > 'Receiving Expedite - Draft'.\n2. Fields: Supplier PO, Carrier, Tracking, Date of Arrival.\n3. Verify delivery via carrier portal. Enter 'N/A' if 'Signed By' name is unknown.
Rationale: For items delivered but 'Awaiting Receipt' >3 days.

Instructions: 1. Open Salesforce Case.\n2. Email: URGENTRECEIVING.HK@arrowasia.com.\n3. Template: [Supplier PO, SO, Supplier, Tracking, Carrier, Arrival Date, MPN, Qty].
1. Sure Ship: Email ecommerce.dlc.emea@arrow.com and Helpdeskvenlo.dlc.emea@arrow.com.\n2. Receiving: Email business.support.pdc.emea@arrow.com.
1. MyConnect > 'Warehouse IT Support - WMS'.\n2. Fields: Delivery ID, Whse Code, Pick Status.\n3. Use for: Packing list reprint errors or printer issues.
1. MyConnect > 'Report a Digital Issue' (Arrow.com or Verical).\n2. Required: URL/Link, Screenshot, WEB-SO, and User Email.
Rationale: Reporting website bugs or account access errors.

Instructions: 1. Check if user is blocked in SWB.\n2. If not blocked in SWB but getting error on site, submit 'Digital Issue' ticket.
Report via 'Digital Business Operations Request Form' if price breaks are not reflecting correctly.

1. Identify unpaid order from 'DROPSHIP REPORT'.
2. Create new SO with original info (Ensure MFR: e.g., MOLEX_WAL).
3. Set Resale to $0.00 and remove Freight.
4. Apply manual hold: 'Replacement SO; reaching out to [SUPPLIER] for PO Cancellation'.
Rationale: Paying 3rd party vendors on unbilled orders.

Instructions: 1. Get PO# from Info > Drop Ship.\n2. Email: delink and rematch invoices@arrow.com (CC Sophia Ciarlo).\n3. Body: 'Hello - Please confirm receipt of replacement Dropship Order D[NUMBER] to pay [SUPPLIER] for Invoice #[NUMBER].'
Rationale: Linking new PO to supplier invoice.

Instructions: 1. Email 3rd party (Waldom: Kellys@waldom.com / Air Electro: LBuckley@airelectro.com).\n2. Subject: Dropship Order D[NUMBER] - Please cancel.\n3. CC: Sophia Ciarlo. Body: 'Please cancel PO#[NUMBER] ([QTY] pcs / PN [PART] / Customer: [NAME]).'
Rationale: Voiding old POs to prevent double payment.

Instructions: Teams message PEI regarding daily cancellations for 5 replacement POs from 10/16-10/21.
Rationale: Manual cancellation tracking for PEI Genesis.

Instructions: 1. Email: verical-logistics@verical.com (CC amunoz@arrow.com, jawells@arrow.com).\n2. Body: Hello Team, Please provide MFG CoC for WEB-SO: / PO: / DID: / MPN: / Line: / Regards.
Use the following link: https://wms-prod.arrow.com/PAWMSReprints/
Submit via: https://arrow.tfaforms.net/4865283
Rationale: Request link for standard compliance docs.

Instructions: Submit via: arrowcrm.my.salesforce-sites.com/arrowservices (For VM5, V37, V38, etc.).
